mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(PEN_ID) AS COUNT FROM PENSION

SELECT P.PEN_ID , P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , SUBSTRING_INDEX(A.PEN_IMAGE, '_', -1) AS PEN_IMAGE , AVG(REV_STAR) AS STAR , COUNT(R.REV_NUM) AS RV , (SELECT IFNULL( MIN(CAST(RM_PRICE AS UNSIGNED)) , 0) FROM PENSION_ROOM WHERE PEN_ID = P.PEN_ID) AS RM_PRICE
FROM PENSION P LEFT OUTER JOIN PENSION_ATTACH A ON P.PEN_ID = A.PEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON A.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID WHERE 1=1
AND PEN_NAME LIKE '%${pen_name}%'
AND PEN_ADDRESS LIKE '%${pen_address}%'
GROUP BY P.PEN_ID, P.PEN_NAME, A.PEN_IMAGE LIMIT ${index} , ${amount}

SELECT A.PEN_IMAGE , P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , IFNULL(ROUND(AVG(R.REV_STAR),1), ' ') AS STAR FROM PENSION P LEFT OUTER JOIN PENSION_ATTACH A ON P.PEN_ID = A.PEN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN REVIEW R ON A.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID GROUP BY P.PEN_ID, A.PEN_IMAGE ORDER BY AVG(R.REV_STAR) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PENSION( PEN_ID, USER_ID, PEN_NAME, PEN_ADDRESS, PEN_ZIPCODE, PEN_NUMBER ) VALUES( #{PEN_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{PEN_NAME}, #{PEN_ADDRESS}, #{PEN_ZIPCODE}, #{PEN_NUMBER})

INSERT INTO PENSION_ROOM( PEN_ID, RM_NAME, RM_CHECKIN, RM_CHECKOUT, RM_PRICE, RM_RESABLE_NUM, RES_STATUS ) VALUES
(#{item.PEN_ID}, #{item.RM_NAME}, #{item.RM_CHECKIN}, #{item.RM_CHECKOUT}, #{item.RM_PRICE}, #{item.RM_RESABLE_NUM}, #{item.RES_STATUS})
mapper.select: SELECT Count(P.PEN_ID) 'RCOUNT' FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN PENSION P ON (P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = R.USER_ID) WHERE P.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
SELECT P.PEN_NAME , P.PEN_ADDRESS , A.PEN_IMAGE FROM PENSION P JOIN PENSION_ATTACH A ON P.PEN_ID = A.PEN_ID WHERE P.PEN_NAME = #{PEN_NAME};

SELECT R.RM_PRICE , R.RM_CHECKIN , R.RM_CHECKOUT , RA.RM_NAME , RA.RM_IMAGE FROM PENSION P JOIN PENSION_ROOM R ON P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID JOIN ROOM_ATTACH RA ON R.RM_NAME = RA.RM_NAME WHERE P.PEN_NAME = #{PEN_NAME} ORDER BY CONVERT(R.RM_PRICE, SIGNED);

SELECT R.RES_NUMBER , P.PEN_NAME, R.RM_NAME , M.USER_NAME, R.USER_ID , R.CHECK_IN_D, R.CHECK_IN_T , R.CHECK_OUT_D, R.CHECK_OUT_T , R.RES_TIME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN PENSION P ON (P.PEN_ID = R.PEN_ID) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_ID = R.USER_ID) WHERE P.USER_ID = #{user_id}
